Klasse ProfileService

java.lang.Object
com.spirit.application.service.ProfileService
@Service public class ProfileService extends Object
Service class for managing user profiles. Includes methods for saving, retrieving, and deleting profile information.

  • Methodendetails

    • saveProfileImage

      public void saveProfileImage(Long profileId, String base64Image)
      Saves a profile image.
      Parameter:
      profileId - the profile ID
      base64Image - the image in Base64 format

    • saveSocials

      public void saveSocials(Profile profile, String webseite, String description)
      Saves the social information of a profile (e.g., website, description).
      Parameter:
      profile - the profile
      webseite - the website URL
      description - the profile description

    • getProfileImage

      public String getProfileImage(Long profileId)
      Retrieves the profile image of a profile.
      Parameter:
      profileId - the profile ID
      Gibt zurück:
      the profile image in Base64 format

      public void deleteProfileImage(Long profileId)

    • deleteProfile

      @Transactional public void deleteProfile(Long profileId)
      Deletes a user profile and all associated data.
      Parameter:
      profileId - the profile ID
